languages.text: "Здесь наши пути расходятся, Вольный Торговец. Для вас превыше всего собственные цели, я же — орудие Лекс Империалис. И моя служба еще не окончена. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: "Здесь наши пути расходятся, Вольный Торговец. Для вас превыше всего собственные цели, я же — орудие Лекс Империалис. И моя служба еще не окончена. Прощайте".

languages.text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
languages.original_text: "Здесь наши пути расходятся, Вольный Торговец. Для вас превыше всего собственные цели, я же — орудие Лекс Империалис. И моя служба еще не окончена. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
"This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
"This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
"This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
"This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."
"This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

languages.text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt Eure eigenen Ziele über alles andere gestellt, doch ich bin eine Waffe des Lex Imperia – und meine Pflicht ist noch nicht erfüllt. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt Eure eigenen Ziele über alles andere gestellt, doch ich bin eine Waffe des Lex Imperia – und meine Pflicht ist noch nicht erfüllt. Lebt wohl."

languages.text: « C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}. Contrairement à vous, qui donnez la priorité à vos propres objectifs, je suis une arme de la Lex Imperialis et j'ai un devoir à accomplir. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ici que nos chemins se séparent, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}. Contrairement à vous, qui donnez la priorité à vos propres objectifs, je suis une arme de la Lex Imperialis et j'ai un devoir à accomplir. Adieu. »

languages.text: “我们就此分道扬镳吧，行商浪人。你认为你自己的目标高于一切，但我是帝国法典的武器，我的职责还没有完成。我们就此别过。”
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: “我们就此分道扬镳吧，行商浪人。你认为你自己的目标高于一切，但我是帝国法典的武器，我的职责还没有完成。我们就此别过。”

languages.text: «Aquí se separan nuestros caminos, Comerciante Independiente. Usted antepone sus propios objetivos a todo lo demás, mientras que yo soy un arma de la Lex Imperialis... y mi deber aún no ha terminado. Adiós».
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí se separan nuestros caminos, Comerciante Independiente. Usted antepone sus propios objetivos a todo lo demás, mientras que yo soy un arma de la Lex Imperialis... y mi deber aún no ha terminado. Adiós».

languages.text: 「ここで私たちの道は分かれます。ローグトレーダー。あなたは己の目的を何より優先するが、私はレックス・インペリアの武器であり、まだ果たすべき使命があります。さようなら」
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: 「ここで私たちの道は分かれます。ローグトレーダー。あなたは己の目的を何より優先するが、私はレックス・インペリアの武器であり、まだ果たすべき使命があります。さようなら」

languages.text: "İşte yollarımızın ayrıldığı yer burası Hür Tacir. Siz kendi ülkünüzü her şeyden üstün tutarsınız, oysa ben Lex İmperialis'in emrindeki bir silahtan öte değilim. Vazifem henüz bitmedi. Hoşça kalın."
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, Rogue Trader. You put your own goals above all else, whereas I am a weapon of the Lex Imperialis — and my duty is not yet done. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "İşte yollarımızın ayrıldığı yer burası Hür Tacir. Siz kendi ülkünüzü her şeyden üstün tutarsınız, oysa ben Lex İmperialis'in emrindeki bir silahtan öte değilim ve vazifem henüz bitmedi. Hoşça kalın."
